content: It does not seem :recurse parameter in a search string is explained anywhere in the Search section, even though _revinclude:recurse and _include:recurse are supported by FHIR test servers. Is it somewhere else?

:recurse was renamed to :iterate in R4 - http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/search.html#include

You can see the documentation for :recurse back in STU3 - http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/STU3/search.html#revinclude

:recurse was renamed to :iterate in R4 - http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/search.html#include

OK, got it. Thank you.

The following query:
GET [base]/Organization?name=[string]&_revinclude=OrganizationAffiliation:participating-organization&_include:iterate=OrganizationAffiliation:location

returns only Organization(s) and related OrganizationAffiliation(s) but not Locations.
Previously I would use _include:recurse.
This was tested against the HAPI Test Server, so it may be that this server does not support such type of search.
